overview: They provide the long, strong arm of the law, but sometimes policemen have to go that extra mile in pursuit of justice – a fact that director John Smith very much makes the most of in this orgy-themed bonanza! Dick Casey, Nick Vargas and Benjamin Dunn are just three of the officers who stand between our society and anarchy; proving, in the process, that policing can be the ultra-challenging profession. Even more so when there’s the constant temptation of hard cocks, heavy balls and copious amounts of sticky spunk with each and every callout!
title: Police Prowlers
